Shaft Splitter.name: Shaft Splitter
Shaft Splitter.fullText:
Sylvan Archer Attack 11Shaft Splitter

As your foe launches his attack, you loose a shot right down his sights.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Immediate Interrupt      Ranged weapon

Trigger: An enemy hits you or an ally within 5 squares of you with a ranged attack

Target: The triggering enemy

Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –5 penalty to the triggering attack roll.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 68.
Shaft Splitter.flavor: As your foe launches his attack, you loose a shot right down his sights.
Shaft Splitter.trigger: An enemy hits you or an ally within 5 squares of you with a ranged attack
Shaft Splitter.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –5 penalty to the triggering attack roll.

Elf-Eyed Archery.name: Elf-Eyed Archery
Elf-Eyed Archery.fullText:
Sylvan Archer Utility 12Elf-Eyed Archery

You can easily divide your attention between chosen targets.

Encounter        Martial
Minor Action      Ranged sight

Target: One creature

Effect: You designate the target as your quarry, even if it isn’t the closest enemy to you. The target doesn’t count against your normal limit of one quarry at a time, although you can still deal your Hunter’s Quarry damage only once per round.

Special: Using this power doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 68.
Elf-Eyed Archery.flavor: You can easily divide your attention between chosen targets.
Elf-Eyed Archery.effect: You designate the target as your quarry, even if it isn’t the closest enemy to you. The target doesn’t count against your normal limit of one quarry at a time, although you can still deal your Hunter’s Quarry damage only once per round.
Elf-Eyed Archery.special: Using this power doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Named Arrow.name: Named Arrow
Named Arrow.fullText:
Sylvan Archer Attack 20Named Arrow

Whispering your foe’s name in Elven, you loose your arrow and watch it streak unerringly across the battlefield.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Effect: If you speak the target’s name when you use this power, you designate the target as your quarry and take no penalties to the attack roll for cover, superior cover, concealment, or total concealment.

Attack: Dexterity vs. Will

Hit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). If you spoke the target’s name, instead of being dazed, the target is stunned (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn. If you spoke the target’s name, instead of being dazed, the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 68.
Named Arrow.flavor: Whispering your foe’s name in Elven, you loose your arrow and watch it streak unerringly across the battlefield.
Named Arrow.effect: If you speak the target’s name when you use this power, you designate the target as your quarry and take no penalties to the attack roll for cover, superior cover, concealment, or total concealment.
Named Arrow.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). If you spoke the target’s name, instead of being dazed, the target is stunned (save ends).
Named Arrow.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn. If you spoke the target’s name, instead of being dazed, the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.
